ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: The Patient-Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMISÂ®) Pediatric Item Bank v2.0 - Pain Interference - Short Form 8a is an 8-item self-report questionnaire completed by children that assesses how pain impacts a child's daily activities of living and the enjoyment of those activities.
